keyPolicies.policyDescription: World-class healthcare with more doctors and nurses, a programme to grow our own medical professionals and the continued fight for services at the West Cumberland Hospital.
Economic growth and opportunity for everyone as Copeland receives the biggest private sector investment we have ever seen.
New investments in education and training so that all of our young people can fulfill their potential and grow our world-class skills base.
New town centre regeneration, continued nuclear investments.
More support for our pensioners and those in need of elderly care.

issues.economy: Economic growth and opportunity for everyone as Copeland receives the biggest private sector investment we have ever seen.
issues.education: New investments in education and training so that all of our young people can fulfill their potential and grow our world-class skills base.
issues.health: World-class healthcare with more doctors and nurses, a programme to grow our own medical professionals and the continued fight for services at the West Cumberland Hospital.
issues.socialWelfare: More support for our pensioners and those in need of elderly care.

images.caption: VOTE Jamie Reed Labour for Copeland

leaflet.additionalNotes: Promoted by Peter Kane on behalf of Jamie Reed.
